title: The vvay to true peace and rest Deliuered at Edinborough in xvi. sermons: on the Lords Supper: Hezechiahs sicknesse: and other select Scriptures. By that reuerend & faithfull preacher of Gods word: Mr. Robert Bruce, for the present, minister of the Word in Scotland.
author: Bruce, Robert, 1554-1631.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R. Field for Thomas Man and Ionas Man, dwelling in Pater-noster row at the signe of the Talbot,
